scripts.start: pnpm run worker && pnpm run processor && pnpm run graphql && pnpm run metrics
scripts.build:ci: rm -rf lib && tsc && pnpm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.augment:generate: pnpm run generate:defs && pnpm run generate:meta
scripts.metadata:generate: pnpm run metadata:fetch && pnpm run metadata:typegen
scripts.metadata:fetch: pnpm run metadata:matrix && pnpm run metadata:relay
scripts.metadata:matrix: rm -rf typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl && npx squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl && npx squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl
scripts.metadata:relay: rm -rf typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl typegen/canary-relay.jsonl && npx squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl && npx squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-relay.jsonl
scripts.metadata:typegen: rm -rf typegen/chain-specs.jsonl && cat typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl typegen/canary-relay.jsonl > typegen/chain-specs.jsonl && npx squid-substrate-typegen typegen/typegen.json
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib
